nodes.text: The Nine Day Island was a small river island located in the Grendin River, on the planet Lok. It was used as a racetrack for the Lok Marathon.

The Nine Day Island appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. Its name was revealed during the Lok Marathon swoop race.
